issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
1.base UI > view > webview > local
2.drag your finger to invoke webview controls
3.tap them

results: they do not respond to touch
expected: if we invoke them, let them work. 2.3 working as expected. other webview tests work as expected in regards to controls

new test / functionality so not a regression by definition
fields.summary: Android - 2.2 - webview zoom controls do not reflect zoom and do not function (on specific test)

comments.body: Closing ticket as invalid as this version of Kitchen Sink is no longer supported. There is now a new version of Kitchen Sink so if there are any problems, please file a new ticket.
